entries.journal_entry_description: Upon examining the runestone closer, Adressa fell gravely ill. She suspects it was a curse from her sister. SHe promises to become a better person if you give her a chance by collecting the ingredients for her antidote. She needs spider venom from Webweavers and a Mysess Blossom found in the forest.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Find a sample of spider venom from Webweavers in the forest.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Find a Mysess Blossom for Adressa's antidote.
